scripts.build_docker_script: cd lib/manager/recording && npm run build && cd -
scripts.// [Comment_02] //: build_docker: generate docker image with transpile script
scripts.build_docker: npm run build_docker_script && cd lib/manager/&& docker build -t dannadori/hmm . && cd -
scripts.// [Comment_03] //: push_docker_image: push image to dockerhub with generate docker image
scripts.push_docker_image: npm run build_docker && docker push dannadori/hmm
scripts.build_all: npm run build && cdk deploy --outputs-file cfn_outputs.json
